---
title: from_h5ad_to_h5mu
---

Converts a single layer h5ad file into a single muon object


## Argument help

Run the following command to view the module's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script target/nextflow/convert/from_h5ad_to_h5mu/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name       |Description       |Attributes                            |
|:----------|:-----------------|:-------------------------------------|
|`--input`  |Input h5ad files  |file, required, default: "input.h5ad" |
|`--output` |Output muon file. |file, default: "output.h5mu"          |
:::
